attributes.action: Stop Discrimination against Married couples in tax system
attributes.additional_details:
Married couples are thousands of pounds worse off than parents or individuals who do not live together under the UK tax and benefits system. The government should legislate to ensure that couples are not discriminated against in the tax and benefits system.
See this article in the Daily Telegraph for more information: http://www.telegraph.co.uk/finance/4061560/Married-couples-punished-by-tax-system.html.
Another interesting article in the Daily Mail: ttp://www.dailymail.co.uk/debate/article-2025553/UK-riots-Unique-chance-mend-Britains-broken-society.html?ito=feeds-newsxml
